DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Alprostadil Prevent Contrast Induced Nephropathy
DOC.detailed_description: The number cardiac angiography percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) increase steadily recent year . This result increase incidence contrast-induced nephropathy ( CIN ) . Major risk factor CIN include old age , diabetes mellitus ( DM ) , chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) . The aim prospective , randomize , control study investigate effect pretreatment intravenous Alprostadil incidence CIN high-risk population patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) CKD undergo coronary angiography , evaluate influence potential benefit short-term outcome .
DOC.criteria: Patient underwent coronary angiography T2DM CKD stag 2 3 , eGFR 30 89ml/min per 1.73m2 Alprostadil naive , Alprostadil treatment least 14 day Withdrawal metformin aminophylline 48h angiography serum Cr . More 3 mg/dl electrolyte acidbase imbalance pulmonary edema allergy Alprostadil
